com.quest.glue.api.services
Class SignalledExitException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              com.quest.glue.api.services.SignalledExitException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SignalledExitException
extends java.io.IOException

An exception thrown when a process has exited by throwing a signal instead of returning cleanly. Usually this means the process was killed or crashed in some way.

Note that the actual value of the signal is entirely dependent on the operating system that the process is running on.

See Also:
